tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE photographs (
  photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  photo_name VARCHAR(255),
  photo_description TEXT,
  photo_date DATE,
  tags JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE historical_photos (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 image_url VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT,
 date_taken DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tags (
 tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE photo_tags (
 photo_id INT,
 tag_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (photo_id, tag_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (photo_id) REFERENCES historical_photos(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(tag_id)
)

CREATE TABLE photographers (
 photographer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 photographer_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE photo_uploads (
 photo_id INT,
 photographer_id INT,
 upload_date TIMESTAMP,
 PRIMARY KEY (photo_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (photo_id) REFERENCES historical_photos(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (photographer_id) REFERENCES photographers(photographer_id)
)
